text.section: When outside the confines of a prerelease unit for women, an inmate shall carry, at all times, a copy of the form signed by the facility administrator containing the conditions governing the grant of leave.

section.section: An inmate who is on leave is deemed to be in the custody of the Commissioner to the same extent and subject to the same supervision and control as an inmate who is actually in confinement.
An inmate who escapes while on leave under this section is subject to the penalties in § 9-404 of the Criminal Law Article.
